scripts.test:unit: pipenv run python3 -m pytest -v tests/unit --cov . --cov-report term-missing
scripts.test:coverage-report: pipenv run python3 -m pytest -v tests/unit --cov-report xml --cov=. && pipenv run python3 -m coverage report
scripts.code-climate:upload: ./cc-test-reporter format-coverage -t coverage.py -o codeclimate.xml coverage.xml && ./cc-test-reporter upload-coverage -i codeclimate.xml
